screen_home.what_to_check: What would you like to confirm?
screen_home.contacts_description: Confirm identity of contacts, family, friends and network
screen_home.phone_number_description: Confirm identity of the person you are talking to

screen_settings.my_profile_description: Edit your name, image and other details
screen_settings.app_permissions_description: Manage app permissions for notifications, camera, and other features
screen_settings.support_feedback_description: We welcome your feedback. Feel free to reach out to us anytime!
screen_settings.delete_account_description: Deleting your account will remove all your data. You'll need to confirm to proceed.

screen_settings.delete_account_confirmation_alert_messag: An error occurred while deleting your account
screen_settings.lock_with_pin_description: Secure your app with 'Lock with PIN' for faster access next time, or log out completely to require your email and password for the next login.
screen_settings.lock_error_alert_message: An error occurred while locking the app

screen_delete_account.delete_account_description: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including your profile, contacts, and all associated information. This action cannot be undone and your data cannot be recovered.
screen_delete_account.delete_account_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
screen_delete_account.delete_account_error_message: An error occurred while deleting your account

screen_profile_edit.edit_profile_description: Edit your name, image and other details
screen_profile_edit.edit_profile_save_changes_button_descrip: Save your changes to your profile

screen_enter_pincode.enter_pincode_description: Enter your PIN code to access
screen_enter_pincode.enter_pincode_if_no_activity: If there has been no activity for 5 minutes, you must use your PIN code to unlock.

screen_terms_of_service.terms_of_service_description: Before you start using our service, please read and agree to our Terms of Service.
screen_terms_of_service.terms_of_service_error_message: An error occurred while loading the terms of service
screen_terms_of_service.terms_of_service_pre_text: I have read and agree to the

screen_onboarding_begin.onboarding_begin_description: To protect your secure contacts, we'll use PIN code verification. We'll guide you step-by-step to set up your profile and security features, ensuring a safe and personalized experience.

screen_onboarding_pin.onboarding_pin_if_inactive: If the app is inactive for 5 minutes, you will need to use this PIN code to access your contacts.

screen_onboarding_pin_confirm.onboarding_pin_confirm_description: Please re-enter the PIN code to confirm it matches your intended input.

screen_onboarding_profile.onboarding_profile_description: We need a few basic details to help your contacts recognize your profile.
screen_onboarding_profile.onboarding_profile_save_changes_button_d: Save your changes to your profile

screen_onboarding_phone_number.description: If you want to receive pre-calls, we need your phone number.
screen_onboarding_phone_number.title: Add Phone Number

screen_onboarding_profile_image.onboarding_profile_image_description: Upload a profile image to help your contacts recognize your profile.
screen_onboarding_profile_image.onboarding_profile_image_save_profile_de: Save your profile image to your profile

screen_login.login_description: Create account or login without password (recommended)
screen_login.login_description_with_password: Create user or login, where you need to use a password

screen_login_magic_link.login_magic_link_description: Enter your email – we will automatically create your account and send you a login link.

screen_login_check_email.login_check_email_description:
We’ve sent a confirmation email to $email. Please click the link inside to confirm your account.

If you don’t see the email in your inbox within a few minutes, please check your Spam or Junk folder.

screen_login_forgot_password.forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

widgets_auth_create_user_form.create_user_form_password_validator_leng: Password must be at least 6 characters

widgets_auth_email_and_password_form.email_and_password_form_password_validat: Password must be at least 6 characters

widgets_auth_forgot_password_form.forgot_password_form_snackbar_password_r: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.

widgets_contacts.contacts_empty_state_text: Click the plus (+) to add a contact
widgets_contacts.contacts_empty_state_text_no_contacts_fo: No contacts found matching your search

widgets_zero_contacts.add_contact_instruction: Tap the + button to add your first contact

screen_contacts_connect.connect_how_to_connect: How do you want to connect?
screen_contacts_connect.connect_meet_in_person_body: When meeting your new contact in person, and they can present their phone to you for verification or interaction.
screen_contacts_connect.connect_connect_online_body: If meeting in person isn't possible, use email, text, or other remote methods to establish contact.

screen_contacts_connect_meet_in_person.meet_in_person_help_text: To connect, one of you must choose Create QR Code, and the other must choose Scan QR Code.
screen_contacts_connect_meet_in_person.meet_in_person_create_qr_code_body: Generate the QR code for your contact
screen_contacts_connect_meet_in_person.meet_in_person_scan_qr_code_body: Scan the QR code your contact has generated

screen_contacts_connect_create_qr_code.create_qr_code_body: The person you want to connect with simply needs to scan this QR code in their own ID-Truster app.
screen_contacts_connect_create_qr_code.create_qr_code_error_no_secret_key: Could not find secret key. Please try again.
screen_contacts_connect_create_qr_code.create_qr_code_error_invitation_not_foun: Could not find invitation. Please try again.

screen_contacts_connect_qr_code_scanner.qr_code_scanner_body: Hold your camera up to a QR code to scan it

screen_contacts_connect_qr_code_scanner.qr_code_scanner_error_parsing_qr_code: Error parsing QR code. Please try again.

screen_contacts_connect_confirm.confirm_connection_no_confirmed_yet: I need both of us to confirm before connecting.

screen_contacts_connect_level_3_create_l.link_in_clipboard: The link has been copied to your clipboard. Only send the link through channels where you are certain of the recipient's identity.

screen_contacts_connect_level_3_confirm.error_invalid_invitation_code: The invitation code is invalid or incomplete. Please check that you copied the entire code correctly.

widget_reset_password.password_must_be_at_least_6_characters: Password must be at least 6 characters

widget_reset_password.pin_code_required: PIN code must be validated first
widget_reset_password.enter_pin_code_description: Enter the PIN code that was sent to your email address.

modal_password_reset_error.title: PIN Code Incorrect
modal_password_reset_error.message: The PIN code you entered was incorrect or has expired. Please request a new PIN code.

modal_password_reset_success.title: Password Changed

screen_update_security_key.title: Update Security Key
screen_update_security_key.heading: Enter Your Original Security Key
screen_update_security_key.description: Your security key has been corrupted and no longer works for this account. Find your original security key in your backup and enter it below to restore access.
screen_update_security_key.reset_dialog_content:
This action will permanently delete all your contacts and reset your security key. This cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to continue?
screen_update_security_key.reset_success_message: Security key reset successfully. All contacts have been deleted.
screen_update_security_key.reset_failed_message: Failed to reset security key. Please try again.
screen_update_security_key.reset_link: Reset security key - this will delete all your contacts

screen_maintenance.title: System Maintenance
screen_maintenance.description: The system is currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.

screen_invalid_secure_key.title: Invalid Secure Key
screen_invalid_secure_key.description: The secure key is invalid. Please insert your ID-Truster secure key from your backup.

screen_update_app.title: App Update Required
screen_update_app.description: A new version of the app is available. Please update to continue using the app.
